description: This file defines the RoundedRectDrawable class which extends Drawable to draw a rounded rectangle with a customizable fill color and corner radius. It also applies a subtle shadow effect to enhance visual aesthetics, typically used for UI elements like cards or buttons.

classes.name: RoundedRectDrawable
classes.description: A Drawable subclass that renders a rounded rectangle with optional shadow for modern UI elements.

methods.name: draw
methods.description: Draws the rounded rectangle with the specified bounds on the provided Canvas.

methods.name: setAlpha
methods.description: Sets the alpha transparency for the drawable's paint.

methods.name: setColorFilter
methods.description: Applies a color filter to the drawable's paint.

methods.name: getOpacity
methods.description: Returns the opacity/transparency configuration of the drawable.
